comment: The forward implication of Wilson's theorem ~ wilth (see ~ wilthlem3 ), expressed using the modulo operation: For any prime ` p ` we have ` ( p - 1 ) ! == - 1 ` (mod ` p ` ), see theorem 5.24 in [ApostolNT] p. 116. (Contributed by AV, 21-Jul-2021.)
